title: 1.5- Cavaliers and Roundheads
itunes:title: 1.5- Cavaliers and Roundheads
description: After negotiations with Parliament broke down, King Charles raised his standard in August, 1642. The opening campaigns of the First Civil War tilted in the Royalists favor.
content:encoded: After negotiations with Parliament broke down, King Charles raised his standard in August, 1642. The opening campaigns of the First Civil War tilted in the Royalists favor.
